library(knitr)

  knitr_figs_dir <- "knitr-figs-pdf/"

}

  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  comment = "#>",

  out.width = fig_out_width,

  cache.comments = FALSE,
  dev = fig_out_type,
  dpi = fig_dpi,
  fig.align = fig_align,

)
